chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] /\ m <> Locked \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)

Premises:
Output = Msg : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
Inductive Label : Type := InputLock : Client_index -> Label | InputUnlock : Client_index -> Label | MsgUnlock : Label | MsgLock : Client_index -> Label | MsgLocked : Client_index -> Label | Nop : Label | Silent : Label
held = fun d : Data => let (_, held) := d in held : Data -> bool
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record Data : Type := mkData { queue : list Client_index; held : bool } Arguments mkData _%list_scope _%bool_scope
ClientNetHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Locked => put {| queue := []; held := true |};; write_output Locked;; ret (MsgLocked i) | _ => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = [a] -> x = [] /\ y = [a] \/ x = [a] /\ y = []
valid_unlock = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pSrc p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_unlock _%list_scope _%bool_scope
valid_locked = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pDst p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_locked _%list_scope _%bool_scope
LockServ_network_network_invariant = fun p q : packet => (pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Unlock -> False) /\ (pBody p = Locked -> pBody q = Unlock -> False) /\ (pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Locked -> False) /\ (pBody p = Locked -> pBody q = Locked -> False) : packet -> packet -> Prop
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')
ServerNetHandler = fun (src : Name) (m : Msg) => st <- get;; (let q := queue st in match m with | Lock => match src with | Client c => (when (null q) (send (src, Locked));; put {| queue := q ++ [c]; held := held st |});; ret (MsgLock c) | Server => ret Nop end | Unlock => match q with | _ :: x :: xs => put {| queue := x :: xs; held := held st |};; send (Client x, Locked) | _ => put {| queue := []; held := held st |} end;; ret MsgUnlock | Locked => ret Nop end) : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
distinct_pairs_and = fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop Arguments distinct_pairs_and {A}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
NetHandler = fun (nm src : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientNetHandler c m | Server => ServerNetHandler src m end : Name -> Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
ClientIOHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Lock => send (Server, Lock);; ret (InputLock i) | Unlock => data <- get;; when (held data) (put {| queue := []; held := false |};; send (Server, Unlock));; ret (InputUnlock i) | Locked => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
LabeledStepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> lb_net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> lb_step_ordered_failure (failed, net) lb (failed, net') tr
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
LabeledStepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> lb_net_handlers to from m d = (lb, out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) to (Some d') |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> lb_step_ordered_dynamic net lb net' tr
StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr
nodup = NoDup_cons Server (fun H : In Server (map Client (all_fin num_Clients)) => let H0 : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) -> exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l := fun (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B) => match in_map_iff f l y with | conj x _ => x end in let H1 : exists x : Client_index, Client x = Server /\ In x (all_fin num_Clients) := H0 Client_index Name Client (all_fin num_Clients) Server H in match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ x (conj H3 _) => let H5 : False := eq_ind (Client x) (fun e : Name => match e with | Client _ => True | Server => False end) I Server H3 in False_ind False...
LabeledStepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> lb_net_handlers to from m d = (lb, out, d', l) ->...-> lb_step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) lb (failed, net') tr
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Inductive lb_step_ordered_dynamic (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation ordered_dynamic_network label (name * (input + output)) := LabeledStepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> lb_net_handlers to from m d = (lb, out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name...
InputHandler = fun (nm : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientIOHandler c m | Server => ServerIOHandler m end : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
Inductive lb_step_ordered_failure (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation (list name * ordered_network) label (name * (input + output)) := LabeledStepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> lb_net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to...
mutual_exclusion = fun sigma : name -> data => forall m n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client m)) = true -> held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> m = n : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments mutual_exclusion _%function_scope
Inductive lb_step_ordered_dynamic_failure (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) label (name * (input + output)) := LabeledStepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> lb_net_handlers to from m d = (lb, out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (...
lb_step_ordered_dynamic_sind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> label -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P o l o0 l0
lb_step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> label -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P o l o0 l0
step_ordered_sind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> P net net' tr) ->...-> P o o0 l

```coq
```coq
unfold ClientNetHandler in H.
destruct H as [c [m' [st'' [u' [out' [ms' [EQ1 EQ2 EQ3]]]]]]].
destruct m'; [unfold ClientNetHandler; destruct H as [c' [m'' [st''' [u'' [out'' [ms'' [EQ4 EQ5 EQ6]]]]]]]|].
unfold ClientNetHandler in EQ3.
unfold ClientIOHandler in EQ3.
destruct EQ3 as [i [m''' [st'''' [u''' [out''' [ms''' [EQ7 EQ8 EQ9]]]]]]].
rewrite EQ7 in EQ9.
unfold held in EQ9.
rewrite EQ8 in EQ9.
rewrite EQ2 in EQ9.
rewrite EQ1 in EQ9.
simpl in EQ9.
unfold Data in EQ9.
rewrite EQ9.
split.
- intros.
  unfold held in H.
  unfold held in H0.
  simpl in H.
  simpl in H0.
  unfold Data in H.
  unfold Data in H0.
  rewrite H in H0.
  simpl in H0.
  unfold held in H0.
  simpl in H0.
  unfold Data in H0.
  rewrite H0.
  auto.
- split.
  + intros.
    apply app_eq_unit in EQ5.
    destruct EQ5 as [EQ10 EQ11].
    destruct EQ10 as [a [EQ12 EQ13]].
    rewrite EQ13 in EQ11.
    rewrite EQ11 in EQ12.
    simpl in EQ12.
    unfold Data in EQ12.
    rewrite EQ12.
    auto.
  + intros.
    rewrite EQ5.
    simpl.
    unfold Data.
    rewrite EQ1.
    auto.
Qed.```
